de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.persistent

Class ByteArrayUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.persistent.ByteArrayUtil

  • public final class ByteArrayUtil
extends Object
    Class with various utilities for manipulating byte arrays. If you find a reusable copy of this in the Java API, please tell me. Using a ByteArrayOutputStream and DataInputStream doesn't seem appropriate. C.f. DataOutputStream and ByteArrayOutputStream

      • writeSignedVarint

        public static final void writeSignedVarint(ByteBuffer buffer,
                     int val)
        Write an signed integer using a variable-length encoding. The sign bit is moved to bit 0. Data is always written in 7-bit little-endian, where the 8th bit is the continuation flag.
        Parameters:
        buffer - Buffer to write to
        val - number to write

      • writeSignedVarintLong

        public static final void writeSignedVarintLong(ByteBuffer buffer,
                         long val)
        Write a signed long using a variable-length encoding. The sign bit is moved to bit 0. Data is always written in 7-bit little-endian, where the 8th bit is the continuation flag.
        Parameters:
        buffer - Buffer to write to
        val - number to write

      • writeUnsignedVarint

        public static final void writeUnsignedVarint(ByteBuffer buffer,
                       int val)
        Write an unsigned integer using a variable-length encoding. Data is always written in 7-bit little-endian, where the 8th bit is the continuation flag.
        Parameters:
        buffer - Buffer to write to
        val - number to write

      • writeUnsignedVarintLong

        public static final void writeUnsignedVarintLong(ByteBuffer buffer,
                           long val)
        Write an unsigned long using a variable-length encoding. Data is always written in 7-bit little-endian, where the 8th bit is the continuation flag. Note that for integers, this will result in the same encoding as writeUnsignedVarint(java.nio.ByteBuffer, int)
        Parameters:
        buffer - Buffer to write to
        val - number to write

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Encoding size of this integer
